api_list.api_description: Compute basic descriptive statistics over specified time windows.

required_parameters.name: box_id
required_parameters.description: Comma separated list of senseBox IDs.

required_parameters.name: phenomenon
required_parameters.description: The name of the phenomenon you want to download the data for.

required_parameters.name: window
required_parameters.description: Time window over which statistics are computed.

optional_parameters.name: download
optional_parameters.description: Download the result as a file.

optional_parameters.name: columns
optional_parameters.description: Specify columns to include in the response.

optional_parameters.name: bbox
optional_parameters.description: A bounding box to limit the search.

optional_parameters.name: delimiter
optional_parameters.description: Delimiter used if format is csv.

query: Check for any significant aviation weather hazards yesterday. Also, please provide descriptive statistics on temperature for the box ID '57000b8745fd40c8196ad04c', phenomenon 'Temperatur', from date '2023-01-01T00:00:00Z', to date '2023-01-31T23:59:59Z', with operation 'arithmeticMean' over a window of '1d'?
